definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: He's a writer, presenter and active member of the open source community.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个作家和演讲家，是开源社区的活跃分子。

sentences.english: An activist says 18 people have been killed in Deraa alone.
sentences.chinese: 一名活跃分子称，单是Deraa就有18人被杀。

sentences.english: The museum, too, sees itself as activist.
sentences.chinese: 博物馆还自认是活跃分子。

sentences.english: Surveillance officers use ­"spotter cards" to identify activists.
sentences.chinese: 监控官员使用“侦察卡”来识别活跃分子。

sentences.english: A lot of politicians, maybe local activists are gay.
sentences.chinese: 有许多政客，或者当地的活跃分子都是同性恋。

sentences.english: Ensure you are an active member of a relevant forum discussion or networking group.
sentences.chinese: 保证你在相关的论坛或者是网络组是一名活跃分子。

definition: the man (or woman) of the moment (idiom)/influential figure
an awkward person/a difficult person to deal with
erhua variant of 拔尖[ba2 jian1]
to be popular/to be getting on well/much in demand
to merge/to integrate/to become as one/to unify together
